---
title: "Display Images"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
f <- list.files("img") %>% 
  str_c("img/", .)
```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(f[[1]])
```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(f[[2]])
```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(f[[3]])
```
